page.title: 10NEWS OF HARWORTH & BIRCOTES
page.content: To find out about local news,we bought all the local Newspapers for one week.We found out a lot about our environment and people.{GOOD NEWS} Jayne Alexander.Jayne is a pupil at North{Border Junior school.}And a dance pupil in{Miss catherines dance {school Harworth.}She won five medals for Dancing at{Cantley dance festival. {and}in the two years she won 76 medals. { {BAD NEWS.}A runaway boy was tragically killed in a motorway accident.He was about 16 years old and was once a pupil of our school.{Church {Vandalised!}Some stupid teenagers have vandalised our church sometime last week. Fortunately it is no longer in use by our local community and it has not been since last year.Police are now investigating this matter.
